text: 10:7 Daniel 9:6; 9:10; Amos 3:7; Rom 16:25-26; Akar Mogomem 11:15Bizir God damuasava amim, an akam modoghav iti. Eghtɨ Enselɨn namba 7 sɨgham givitɨma, dughiar kamra bizir modoghav itim guizbangɨram otogham. Kar, Akar Aghuir a fomɨra uan ingangarir gumazamizibagh anɨngizim, me an akam inigha izir gumazamiziba.”
